DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetics single dos PF-02341066 ( 150 , 250 , 400 mg ) fast condition Japanese healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study In Japanese Healthy Male Volunteers To Investigate The Safety , Tolerability And Pharmacokinetics Of PF-02341066
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetics single dos PF-02341066 ( 150 , 250 , 400 mg ) fast condition Japanese healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg Subjects smoking , Subjects evidence disease , Subjects condition affect absorption , Subjects treatment investigational drug within 30 day , Subjects history regular alcohol consumption , Subjects use prescription , nonprescription drug dietary supplement within 28 day , Subjects blood donation approximately 400 mL within 3 month 200 mL within 1 month prior dose
DOC.keyword: PK profile Japanese healthy male volunteer
